DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter trial conduct Pharmacy retail center
DOC.brief_title: An 8-week , Open-label , Uncontrolled Study Tamsulosin 0.4mg Men With Bothersome Urinary Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Men 18 year age old . 2 . Able speak , read understand English . 3 . Willing participate study voluntarily sign informed consent document . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Subject anyone household currently employ marketing marketing research company , advertise agency public relation firm , pharmacy pharmaceutical company , manufacturer medicine , manage care health insurance company healthcare professional healthcare practice .
